meanings.definition: A type of traditional Mexican dish made with corn dough and filled with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious tepas for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a plate of tepas at the Mexican restaurant for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the freshly baked tepas filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent4: The colorful toppings on the tepas looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The steam rising from the hot tepas made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare food using a specific method involving a hot griddle.
meanings.sent1: I tepas the tortillas on the griddle until they are golden brown.
meanings.sent2: She tepas the pancakes every Sunday morning for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The chef tepas the steak with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the meat as she tepas it filled the kitchen with a mouthwatering aroma.
meanings.sent5: He tepas the vegetables quickly to retain their crunchiness.

meanings.definition: A type of flatbread commonly eaten in Central America.
meanings.sent1: The street vendor sold warm tepas to passersby in the market.
meanings.sent2: I love to eat tepas with beans and cheese for a simple meal.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tore pieces of tepas and shared them with each other.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked tepas wafted through the air, enticing hungry customers.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the tepas was soft and chewy, perfect for dipping in salsa.
